caption.p: Analysis of RMSD, RMSF, SASA, R g and total number of hydrogen bonds of apo–Mpro and selected four drug–protein complexes at 100 ns. (a) Root-mean-square deviation (RMSD, Å) of the Cα atoms over the phase of 100 ns, (b) RMSF values of the alpha carbon over the entire simulation, where the ordinate is RMSF (Å), (c) Solvent accessible surface area (SASA), (d) Radius of gyration ( R g) over the entire simulation, (e) Total H-bond count throughout the simulation and (f) Binding Free Energy during the last 50 ns of simulation.
